CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sky High Cafe relative to The Golden Spoon?
SRP.A: Sky High Cafe is {above} The Golden Spoon in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total customer traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Emerald Diner}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total customer traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {The Golden Spoon}.

VE.Q: What is The Golden Spoon's Customer Traffic in 1970?
VE.A: The Golden Spoon's customer traffic in 1970 is {501.88} customers/day.

VE.Q: What is The Rusty Kettle's Customer Traffic in 1972?
VE.A: The Rusty Kettle's customer traffic in 1972 is {590.80} customers/day.

VE.Q: What is The Golden Spoon's Customer Traffic in 1975?
VE.A: The Golden Spoon's customer traffic in 1975 is {347.38} customers/day.

VE.Q: What are the customer traffic of Sky High Cafe, The Rusty Kettle, and Emerald Diner in 1971?
VE.A: Sky High Cafe's customer traffic is {504.31} customers/day, The Rusty Kettle's customer traffic is {617.22} customers/day, Emerald Diner's customer traffic is {559.09} customers/day.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Customer Traffic in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum customer traffic is {199.94} customers/day.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Customer Traffic in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum customer traffic is {1170.17} customers/day.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Customer Traffic level recorded for Emerald Diner?
EVJ.A: Emerald Diner reached approximately {1170.17} customers/day in {1979}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Customer Traffic level recorded for Emerald Diner?
EVJ.A: Emerald Diner's lowest recorded level is approximately {474.82} customers/day in {1970}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Customer Traffic?
SC.A: The average total customer traffic is {2575.02} customers/day.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Customer Traffic exceed 2713.67 customers/day? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {2760.30} customers/day in {1971}, {2788.53} customers/day in {1977}, {2807.66} customers/day in {1976}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Customer Traffic go below 2487.34 customers/day? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {2466.28} customers/day in {1970}, {2357.63} customers/day in {1973}, {2336.28} customers/day in {1974}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Customer Traffic fall between 2470.48 and 2730.53 customers/day? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {2496.37} customers/day in {1978}, {2535.62} customers/day in {1975}, {2693.68} customers/day in {1972}.

NC.Q: Was the total Customer Traffic in 1976 higher or lower than in 1979?
NC.A: The total customer traffic in 1976 was {higher} than in 1979.

NC.Q: Was the total Customer Traffic in 1971 higher or lower than in 1974?
NC.A: The total customer traffic in 1971 was {higher} than in 1974.

NC.Q: Between 1973 and 1976, was the average total Customer Traffic higher or lower than between 1975 and 1978?
NC.A: The average total customer traffic between 1973 and 1976 was {lower} than between 1975 and 1978.

NC.Q: Between 1971 and 1973, did the total Customer Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 1974 and 1979?
NC.A: The change in total customer traffic between 1971 and 1973 was {larger} than between 1974 and 1979.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Emerald Diner} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {The Golden Spoon, Sky High Cafe, The Rusty Kettle, Stellar Bistro, Emerald Diner}.
